text: Diggah tama ummatak (Nabii Mucammad frase kataate mara kinnuk) yeemeneh yan maraay, yahuud yekke maraa kee Nasaaraay Saabi-iin deqsita marak Yallaa kee ellecaboh Ayro Nummayseeh meqe taamoomi Abbaasite mari, toysa usun sinni Rabbih xaqul sinni galto-lon, Akeeral meesi ken Amol matanaay Addunyak keenik warrayteemih marookitan, kinnih immay Nabii Mucammad faie rubsumeek lakal Yalli islaam diinik kalih diini hebelt√¥ numuk moggola
